Meet Zixflow—an efficient tool for adding contacts to Zixflow from any web platform like LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, Gmail, and more. No more tedious copy-pasting; Zixflow simplifies CRM building for prospecting, hiring, fundraising, and beyond. Zixflow redefines how we manage & engage contacts. It's agile, customizable, and AI-driven. 

How it works:
> Install the free Zixflow Chrome extension.
> Sign up at https://zixflow.com
> Pin the Zixflow extension to Chrome.
> With Zixflow, add contacts with a single click from any website profile.

What's Inside Zixflow? 

📍 Track interactions with your customers
📍 Create contact lists for every use case
📍 Visualize data with table and kanban views
📍 Run outreach campaigns via SMS, Email, and WhatsApp
📍 Manage replies in a unified inbox
📍 Easily find and verify email addresses
📍 Capture leads with sleek and modern forms
📍 Zixflow AI for custom fields, personalization, and spontaneous ice-breakers
📍 Automate with cadences and workflow automation

Questions or feedback? Email us at support@zixflow.com
